text: khea klaw wa “kha tæ phraphupenceakhxng kha phraxngkh thæcring kha phraxngkh khx khwam khumkhrxng tx phraxngkh than hı phn cak kar rxngreiyn tx phraxngkh than nı sing thi kha phraxngkh mimi khwam ru nı reuxng nan læa hak phraxngkh mi thrng xphay kæ kha phraxngkh læa mi thrng metta kha phraxngkh læw kha phraxngkh k ca xyu nı hmu phu khadthun”
